subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Brad Friedel, the near-40-year-old keeper of Aston Villa, managed a shutout against Manchester City, a mental as well as physical feat for the soccer goalie who is facing serious personal problems.
snippet: Brad Friedel, the near-40-year-old keeper of Aston Villa, managed a shutout against Manchester City, a mental as well as physical feat for the soccer goalie who is facing serious personal problems.
